DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether two oral formulation Gemfibrozil Tablets bioequivalent .
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study Between Two Oral Formulations Gemfibrozil Tablets
DOC.criteria: healthy men woman 18 year age old weight within +/ 20 % height body frame willing participate sign copy inform consent form recent history drug alcohol addiction abuse pregnant lactating woman history allergic response gemfibrozil use tobacco product evidence clinically significant disorder whose laboratory result deem clinically significant receipt drug part research study within 28 day prior study dose
